name: Silver Anniversary of Oscar II and Sofia of Nassau
obverse: Bust of Oscar II and Sofia facing right. Sofia is wearing a diadem.
obverse_inscriptions: OSCAR II SVERIGES OCH NORGES KONUNG · SOPHIA SVERIGES OCH NORGES DROTTNING
reverse: A large ship sails out from a harbor. The entrance of the harbor is flanked by two large columns. A shining star is in the sky.
reverse_inscriptions: MED LJUS FRÄN HÖJDEN GÅR FÄRDEN TRYGG.
description: This medal was made to commemorate the silver wedding anniversary of Oscar II and Sofia of Nassau.
